VII.i.4.B.5.a
.
When to Require Proof of Continued Dependency
Proof of continued dependency is required for award action in disability and death compensation cases when the information on
VA Form 21P-509
is over a year old.
Example
:  Situations may arise in which a determination of entitlement has been delayed pending receipt of
service records, or
other evidence.
title: M21-1, Part VII, Subpart i, Chapter 4, Section B - Establishing Parental Dependency
